title: Grammys 2017: Watch A Pregnant Beyoncé’s Instantly Iconic Performance
text: Beyoncé put on a stunning show at the Grammys tonight that began with a short video of her dressed as a sun goddess, pregnant af and proud of it. Her performance centered around the concept of "motherhood," and she was appropriately introduced by her mom, Tina Knowles. Beyoncé rose from the stage in a sequined … More »
